comment: The FBI went about this in the wrong way. They apparently are not very good at finding the truth. Actress Alyssa Milano says that Kavanaugh is guilty of abuse because he did not file a defamation suit against Dr. Ford. So there you have it. Case solved. Hollywood is helpful in so many ways.
